mapper.select: SELECT HPID as hpid, DUTY_NAME as dutyName, DUTY_ADDR as dutyAddr, DUTY_TEL1 as dutyTel1 FROM PHARMACY_TBL ORDER BY HPID
SELECT HPID as hpid, DUTY_NAME as dutyName, DUTY_ADDR as dutyAddr, DUTY_TEL1 as dutyTel1 FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE HPID = #{hpid}

SELECT HPID as hpid, DUTY_NAME as dutyName, DUTY_ADDR as dutyAddr, DUTY_TEL1 as dutyTel1 FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE 1=1
AND DUTY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{dutyName} || '%'
AND DUTY_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{dutyAddr} || '%'
ORDER BY HPID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE 1=1
AND DUTY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{dutyName} || '%'
AND DUTY_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{dutyAddr} || '%'

choose.when: SELECT HPID as value, DUTY_NAME as label FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE DUTY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY DUTY_NAME
SELECT DISTINCT HPID as value, DUTY_ADDR as label FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE DUTY_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY DUTY_ADDR

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITE_TBL (USER_ID, REF_NO, DUTY_NAME, DUTY_ADDR, DUTY_TEL1) VALUES (#{userId}, #{refNo}, #{dutyName}, #{dutyAddr}, #{dutyTel1})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAVORITE_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND REF_NO = #{refNo}
